General.Name: Vistin Pharma ASA
General.Description: Vistin Pharma ASA, through its subsidiary, Vistin Pharma AS, produces and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) worldwide. It offers metformin HCl APIs and direct compressive granulates for the pharmaceutical industry. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

0.Name: Mr. Magnus  Tolleshaug
0.Title: Interim CEO, Chief Commercial Officer & Commercial Director
